channel.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
channel.description: I was just wondering how many players my server can hold with 2.00GB of ram? Just a rounded number or so...Please and thanks. Taken!

item.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

How do you see how much RAM you have?

Read full topic

item.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Slave Scyth:

With a good processor and other hardware, yes. How many people your PC is able to deal with at a time is almost entirely dependent on how the server source is coded. If it’s shitty, like 90%+ of current servers, it won’t be able to handle very many; but for some of the newer sources that people are denying simply because it’s ‘difficult’, you’d probably be able to hold upwards of 500-1,000.

Where could I get a base like that?
Or do I have to start from blank? ;<

Read full topic

item.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“gon3d34d123, post:9, topic:287024”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=379575.msg2854307#msg2854307 date=1246738587]

Serious? How can i make it to where like 50-100 people can be on at one time?
[/quote]Go non-Winterlove.

You could hold 500 people with 2 gigs of RAM if only the server base you used was well-designed.

Lmao, then what could I have? 2000?[/quote]With a good processor and other hardware, yes. How many people your PC is able to deal with at a time is almost entirely dependent on how the server source is coded. If it’s shitty, like 90%+ of current servers, it won’t be able to handle very many; but for some of the newer sources that people are denying simply because it’s ‘difficult’, you’d probably be able to hold upwards of 500-1,000.

item.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
item.description:

like 4?
[/quote]Go away if you have no idea what you’re talking about.

Atleast 20-25.[/quote]

I was able to have 30 steady with half a gig of RAM, but that was before 377’s came out

As for this topic, it’s the stability of the source, not as much RAM.

item.title: Players With 2.00GB of Ram?
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

I got 6.00 gb RAM
You got 2.00 gb

I got 100/100. <- This is where you fail.

Having “great” RAM does not do evrything.

I recommand VPS

Telenim:

Most people would use a VPS/Dedicated server and over time people join - they would pay a lot of money for a good VPS that would hold enough, it also depends on the stability of the server, I guess.

Word up.

Read full topic
